metadata.feature_description: Search for users and filter by various status criteria

steps.expected: Users panel displays with search box and filter dropdown
steps.actual: Users panel opened showing list of authorized users with search box and 'Show: Authorized' filter

steps.action: Enter 'Test User01' in the search box
steps.expected: List filters to show only users matching 'Test User01'
steps.actual: List updated in real-time to show only Test User01 with email testuser01@test.com

steps.expected: List filters to show only users matching the email address
steps.actual: List updated to show only Test User05 with matching email testuser05@test.com

steps.action: Click on Show dropdown to view filter options
steps.actual: Dropdown opened showing: Authorized, Unauthorized, Deleted, Superusers, All
Shows 15 authorized users (1-10 of 15 entries) including Test User accounts

steps.expected: Only unauthorized users are displayed or 'No users found' message
steps.actual: Filter changed to 'Unauthorized' and displays 'No users found.' message (no unauthorized users exist)

steps.expected: Only deleted users are displayed or 'No users found' message
steps.actual: Filter changed to 'Deleted' and displays 'No users found.' message (no deleted users exist)
Filter changed to 'Superusers' and displays only SuperUser Account (host) with email chetan.verma@ignitech.com

steps.expected: All users regardless of status are displayed
steps.actual: Filter changed to 'All' and displays 15 total entries (1-10 of 15) including all user types

steps.action: Search with lowercase 'test user' (users are named 'Test User')
steps.expected: Search should find users regardless of case
steps.actual: Search found 13 results matching 'test user' (case-insensitive) - showing Test User01 through Test User12

steps.action: Set filter to 'Superusers' and search for 'Super'
steps.expected: Results should be filtered by both criteria
steps.actual: With 'Superusers' filter active and search term 'Super', only SuperUser Account is displayed which matches both criteria

steps.action: Clear the search box by emptying the text
steps.expected: Search is cleared and results show filtered users
steps.actual: Search cleared successfully, filter still applied
Filter changed to 'Authorized', showing 15 authorized users

steps.action: Type search terms and observe updates
steps.expected: Results should update in real-time as user types
steps.actual: Results updated immediately as text was typed without requiring submit/enter key

observations: No 'Locked' filter option exists in the dropdown. Available filters are: Authorized, Unauthorized, Deleted, Superusers, and All. The 'locked users' filter mentioned in test scenarios is not implemented in the UI.

When changing filters while a search term is present, the filter applies but the search text remains visually in the box. However, the results appear to be based on the new filter only until the search is re-executed.
The search appears to search across both Name and Email fields simultaneously.
Pagination is available with '10 users per page' option visible at the bottom of the list.
